name: Crab Odyssey!
description:
Quickly, Rodney and Styles McJeans need your help to reach the fabled shell of eternal beauty!

Rodney is the fastest crab on the eastern seaboard and can outrun even the swiftest of predators, but Styles McJeans has been cursed with an acute visual impairment and can't move as fast as Rodney :(

Programming, Art, Sound Design by Me

Music by Patrick De Arteaga from https://patrickdearteaga.com/ used under a Creative Commons license

Controls
Use the arrow keys to help these crazy crabs avoid the terrifying collider of sadness, but make sure Styles isn't left in the dust, Rodney couldn't bear life without his best friend!
